Name: Steel Plates Faults
Abstract:
A dataset of steel platesâ€™ faults, classified into 7 different types. 
The goal was to train machine learning for automatic pattern recognition.
RelevantInfo:
Type of dependent variables (7 Types of Steel Plates Faults):
1.Pastry
2.Z_Scratch
3.K_Scatch
4.Stains
5.Dirtiness
6.Bumps
7.Other_Faults
